Title: Tanay Parikh | Personal Webpage
Name: Tanay Parikh
Description: Currently Studing at Singhania School,Thane. I love Basketball, kabaddi and Computer Gaming.
I grab every chance I get to travel, learn and create.
AboutContent: I’m a keen student by day, a Basketball player by evening, a passionate wantrepreneur by midnight and a hustler always.
If you can’t find me, it’s because I’m already cycling, off to a hike, or studying for an exam
I am passionate about renewable energy and aim at creating a sustainable India(though, never studied it formally). A die-hard fan of Elon Musk.
I love the way the concept of coding has evolved over the past decades, and hence would love to integrate sustainability to technology in everyday life whenever I can.
WorkContent: I am currently a student at Smt.Sulochanadevi Singhania School who looks forward to pursue engineering.
CVStartLine: I am always open to collaborations with impactful work. Feel free to reach out if you want to work together :)
